slides.text: Challenge - solve the level and then come back and continue

slides.question: Which arguments do we use in the buildXY function if we want to build a fence?
options: fence, x coordinate and y coordinate - this.buildXY('fence', 34, 44)
just x and y coordinates - this.buildXY(34, 44)

slides.text: If you successfuly finished the challenge, click to complete the lesson.
